value:
Goodness, I don't know that I would
call myself a "Hero." But I'll try to be
as heroic as I possibly can.

I was born as a noble in the Empire,
but when I was young my mother and
I fled to a small church in Faerghus.

Don't work too hard, all right? If you
need any help, let me know. I would
be more than happy to lend a hand.

When you're done with your work,
why don't we have tea? I can bake
some treats for us to eat!

I know that the goddess is always
watching over us. That's why I make
sure to pray regularly.

Hello! My, what a lovely place this is.
I come bearing a message from your
friend $Nf.
This is not going as well as I'd hoped.
A new way to make myself useful!

It's so nice to meet you! My name is
Mercedes von Martritz, but you can
just call me Mercie.

How long has it been since we met?
It feels like so long ago—but at the
same time, I remember it vividly.$k$pI felt nervous to be in this unfamiliar
world, far away from the land I had
called home.$k$pI was trying to put on a brave face,
but deep down, I was feeling uneasy.
I had no idea what might happen.$k$pYet when I saw your face... It's hard
to explain. Somehow I knew I would
be safe here.$k$pYou're so unlike me. You don't wait
in fear for "what might happen." You
carve your own path.$k$pYou have shown me that I, too, can
carve my own path. And I'll make
sure my path hews close to yours.
May the grace of the goddess shine upon you.
I don't hate nobles, but I haven't had very good experiences with them in the past...
I have an idea! Why don't I share one of my favorite scary stories with you soon?
*laugh* It will be OK! I promise to protect you.
